maqras.text: 76|19|haey ke  m ng  del now vy ke  m ng chea amt  daerchoumvinh(rngcham  bamreu) puokke .  nowpel del anak( mou ham meat) kheunh puokke anak  nung kitthea  puokke chea kchkhyang da phlu chengchang .
76|20|haey nowpel del anak( mou ham meat) kralek meultow  tinoh( thansuokr)  anak nung kheunh nie k meat krobbebyeang ning  amnach da thomtheng .

76|21|now pi leu khluonobran robsa puokke  ku saamliekbampeak thveuampi  sautr mdthakhai  ning sautr krasa pnrbaitng .  haey puokke trauv ban ke  bampeak kangdai brak .  haey mcheasa robsa puokke ban bratan aoy puokke  nouv phesachch da brisotth  .
76|22|pitabrakd nasa  nih kuchea kar tabasnang samreab puok anak  haey kar kham broengobreng robsa puok anak nung trauv ban ke ttuol yk .
76|23|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchouh kompir kuor an aoy anak  chea damnakkal  .

76|24|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot champoh bt b nhnh te nei  mcheasa robsa anak  haey kom brate b tde tam anak del br pru td babakamm  ryy anak brachheang knongchamnaom puokke aoy saoh .
76|25|haey chaur anak romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa anak teang pruk teang  lngeach .
76|26|haey knongamlongpel yb  chaur anak saou chout( thvayobangkoum)  champoh trong  ning leukatamkeung trong nowpel ybchrow .

76|27|pitabrakd nasa  puok teangnoh( puok mou sh ri ki n)sraleanh  karorsanow knong lokey  haey puokke baohbng thngai del mean pheap  vukavr da khlangokla( thngai barlok) dak kraoyokhnang robsa puokke .

76|28|yeung kuchea anak del ban bangkeut puokke  ning ban pongrung reang  kay robsa puokke .  tebae yeung mean chetnea( bamphlanh puokke) yeung  ka ach phlasabdaur krom phe  sa ng tiet dauch puokke mk chomnuosa vinh ban der .
76|29|pitabrakd nasa  chompouk nih kuchea kar romluk muoy .  dau che  neah  anaknea haey brathnea chngban la noh  ke pitchea chreusareusa meakra tow  kan mcheasa robsa ke cheaminkhan .
76|30|haey puok anak min ach mean bamnng thveuavei muoy ban laey  leuklengte a l laoh mean chetnea bonnaoh .  pitabrakd nasa  a l laoh mha doeng  mha ktebandet .

76|31|daoy trong nung banhchoul tow knong kdei me tda krounea robsa trong  champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea .  haey puok del bampean trong  ban riebcham samreab puokke nouv tearounakamm da sen chhucheab .
77|1|a l laoh sbath nung khyal( ryy mea la ai kat) del trauv ke  banhchoun mk chea b nd banteab .
77|2|ning khyalpyouh da khlangokla .
77|3|ning mea la ai kat del pongreay popk  ning tukaphlieng .
77|4|ning mea la ai kat del bengchek nouv brakear pit  ning brakear  min pit .
77|5|ning mea la ai kat del noam sar mk aoy banda anakneasar .
77|6|daembi bdeseth real kar daohsa  ryy chea kardasatuen promean .
77|7|pitabrakd nasa  avei delke sanyea nung puok anak nung kaetlaeng  yeang pitabrakd .
77|8|banteabmk nowpel del hvaung phkay trauv ban ke thveu aoy bat ponlu .
77|9|haey nowpel del mekh trauv ke thveu aoy bek thlouhthleay .
77|10|haey nowpel del phnom trauv ke thveu aoy phtoh baeng khe  t ch khtei .
77|11|haey nowpel del banda anakneasar trauv ke bramoul tam  kalkamnt .
77|12|tae banda anakneasar trauv ban ke ponyearpel bramoul rhaut  dl thngainea
77|13|ku rhautadl thngai katsechakdei .
77|14|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  thngai vinichchhy chea avei noh
77|15|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|16|tae yeung minban bamphlanh puok chomnean moun( del ban br pru td  babakamm) te ryy
77|17|banteabmk  yeung thveu aoy puok chomnean kraoy vineasa b nd banteab  pi puokke tiet  .
77|18|dau che  neah der  yeung thveu towleu puok br pru td babakamm .
77|19|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|20|tae yeung minban bangkeut puok anak ampi tukkeam del kmean tamlei  te ryy
77|21|kraoyomk yeung ban bangkeut vea nowknong kanleng muoy del mean  sovotthephap( nowknong sbaun)
77|22|rhautadl pel del trauv ke kamnt da cheakleak .
77|23|haey yeung ban kamnt(roubreang  ning lokkhan robsa mnoussa  lok tam del yeung mean chetnea) .  dau che  neah  yeung kuchea anak del  kamnt da brasaer bamphot .
77|24|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|25|tae yeung minban bangkeut phendei chea kanleng bramoulophdom
77|26|teang anak rsa ning anak slab te ryy
77|27|haey yeung ban bangkeut phnom khpasa  now leu vea ning ban phdal tuk  brisotth aoy puok anak .
77|28|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|29|( mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha)  chaur puok anakdaer tow  kan avei( nork) del puok anak thleab ban bdeseth nung vea choh .
77|30|chaur puok anak daer towkean mlob( phsaeng nei phleung nork) del leat  santhung chea bei phnek noh choh .
77|31|kmean mlob na trachak  haeyka kmeanoavei ach karpar pi andat  phleung nork ban der .
77|32|pitabrakd nasa  vea cheah phkaphleung laeng khpasa dauchchea vimean .
77|33|vea( phkaphleung) hakbeidauchchea hvaung satv audth sambour lueng .
77|34|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|35|nih kuchea thngai del puokke min ach niyeay ban laey .
77|36|haey puokke min trauv ke anounhnhat aoy niyeaydaohsa ban  laey .
77|37|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|38|nih haey kuchea thngai katsechakdei  del yeung ban bramoul  puok anak  ning puok chomnean moun .
77|39|dau che  neah  brasenbae puok anak mean lbichakl  chaur puok anak rieb  lbichakl brachheang nung yeung choh .
77|40|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|41|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ku  nowknong mlob cheamuoynung braphp tuk da chraen .
77|42|ning mean phlechheu krob braphet tam avei del puokke brathnea .
77|43|( mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha)  chaur puok anak briphok  ning ttuol daoy kdei rikreay daoysaarte avei del puok anak thleab ban  br pru td choh .
77|44|dau che  neah der  yeung pitchea nung tabasnang dl banda anak del sang  ampeula .
77|45|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|46|( mean ke niyeay towkean puok kmean chomnue tha)  chaur puok anak briphok  ning saoysokh( knong lokey) muoyorypel khlei sen choh  proh pitabrakd nasa  puok anakchea puok br pru td babakamm .
77|47|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|48|haey nowpel del mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha  chaur puok anak aon korp( champoh a l laoh)choh  puokke bercha min aon  korp towvinh .
77|49|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|50|dau che  neah  tae mean peakyasaamdei namuoy banteabpi vea( kompir kuor an)  del thveu aoy puokke mean chomnue noh
